titles.title: A bill to reduce and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Iprodione.
A bill to reduce and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Iprodione.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description for Iprodione; and (2) extend and increase the temporary reduction of duty on such article.
